code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import api from"../services/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function FormSubmissions(){const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{api.get("/forms").then(res=>{setData(res.data);setLoading(false);});},[]);async function handleDownloadPDF(){const res=await api.get("/forms/pdf",{responseType:"blob"});const url=window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([res.data]));const link=document.createElement("a");link.href=url;link.setAttribute("download","submissions.pdf");document.body.appendChild(link);link.click();}async function handleSendEmail(){await api.post("/forms/send-email");alert("üìß Email Sent to Client");}if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"All Submissions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{border:1,cellPadding:8,style:{borderCollapse:"collapse"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Full Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Notes"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:data.map(f=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:f.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:f.full_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:f.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:f.notes})]},f.id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:20},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDownloadPDF,children:"\u2B07\uFE0F Download PDF"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSendEmail,style:{marginLeft:10},children:"\uD83D\uDCE7 Send PDF via Email"})]})]});}
